export function adddToCart(prodId:string){ document.querySelectorAll('.product-click').forEach((selector)=> { selector.addEventListener('click', (e)=>{ const shp = localStorage.getItem('shop')! var shop = JSON.parse(shp) var usr = localStorage.getItem('user')! var user = JSON.parse(usr) var prod = Object.entries(shop) var filtered = prod.filter(([key, value]) => typeof value === prodId) var product = Object.fromEntries(filtered) as Items addToCart(product,user,1) printCart(user) }) }) } onclick="addToCart(${prod},${user},${1})
